C1 to reduce something to the least possible level or amount: We must minimize the risk of infection. Environmentalists are doing everything within their power to minimize the impact of the oil spill. Opposite

to make something seem less important or smaller than it really is: She accused politicians of minimizing the suffering of thousands of people. It's important to focus on your strengths and to minimize your weaknesses. Synonyms
downplay
understateOpposites

maximize
